verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%> the Morasthite <S%H4183><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> Ahaz, <S%H271><s%> and Hezekiah, <S%H3169><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye people; <S%H5971><s%> hearken, <S%H7181><s%> O earth, <S%H776><s%> and all that therein is: <S%H4393><s%> and let the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against you, the Lord <S%H136><s%> from his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1964><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his place, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%> and will come down, <S%H3381><s%> and tread <S%H1869><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be molten <S%H4549><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> him, and the valleys <S%H6010><s%> shall be cleft, <S%H1234><s%> as wax <S%H1749><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> and as the waters <S%H4325><s%> that are poured down <S%H5064><s%> a steep place. <S%H4174><s%>

For the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is all <S%H3605><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> and for the sins <S%H2403><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> What <S%H4310><s%> is the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob? <S%H3290><s%> is it not <S%H3808><s%> Samaria? <S%H8111><s%> and what <S%H4310><s%> are the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Judah? <S%H3063><s%> are they not <S%H3808><s%> Jerusalem? <S%H3389><s%>

Therefore I will make <S%H7760><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> as a heap <S%H5856><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and as plantings <S%H4302><s%> of a vineyard: <S%H3754><s%> and I will pour down <S%H5064><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> thereof into the valley, <S%H1516><s%> and I will discover <S%H1540><s%> the foundations <S%H3247><s%> thereof.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the graven images <S%H6456><s%> thereof shall be beaten to pieces, <S%H3807><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the hires <S%H868><s%> thereof shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with the fire, <S%H784><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the idols <S%H6091><s%> thereof will I lay <S%H7760><s%> desolate: <S%H8077><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> she gathered <S%H6908><s%> it of the hire <S%H4480><s%> <S%H868><s%> of a harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> the hire <S%H868><s%> of a harlot. <S%H2181><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H2063><s%> I will wail <S%H5594><s%> and howl, <S%H3213><s%> I will go <S%H1980><s%> stripped <S%H7758><s%> and naked: <S%H6174><s%> I will make <S%H6213><s%> a wailing <S%H4553><s%> like the dragons, <S%H8568><s%> and mourning <S%H60><s%> as the owls. <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> her wound <S%H4347><s%> is incurable; <S%H605><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it is come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Judah; <S%H3063><s%> he is come <S%H5060><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the gate <S%H8179><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> even to <S%H5704><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Declare <S%H5046><s%> ye it not <S%H408><s%> at Gath, <S%H1661><s%> weep ye not at all: <S%H1058><s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H1058><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Aphrah <S%H1036><s%> roll thyself <S%H6428><s%> in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Pass ye away, <S%H5674><s%> thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Saphir, <S%H8208><s%> having thy shame <S%H1322><s%> naked: <S%H6181><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zaanan <S%H6630><s%> came not forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Beth-ezel; <S%H1018><s%> he shall receive <S%H3947><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> you his standing. <S%H5979><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Maroth <S%H4796><s%> waited carefully <S%H2470><s%> for good: <S%H2896><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

O thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Lachish, <S%H3923><s%> bind <S%H7573><s%> the chariot <S%H4818><s%> to the swift beast: <S%H7409><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> in thee.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shalt thou give <S%H5414><s%> presents <S%H7964><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> Moresheth-gath: <S%H4182><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%> shall be a lie <S%H391><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yet <S%H5750><s%> will I bring <S%H935><s%> an heir <S%H3423><s%> unto thee, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Mareshah: <S%H4762><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> Adullam <S%H5725><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Make thee bald, <S%H7139><s%> and poll <S%H1494><s%> thee for <S%H5921><s%> thy delicate <S%H8588><s%> children; <S%H1121><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> thy baldness <S%H7144><s%> as the eagle; <S%H5404><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they are gone into captivity <S%H1540><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee.
